text: I have a friend who makes large-scale art scans from flower petals/other natural foliage. I saw one he’s working on this weekend and they’re really interesting. If we need some more art for the new walls, and want to showcase something local, I thought I’d pass examples along. The website photos don’t accurately capture the scale or fidelity but I can get more examples if there’s interest. <http://cargocollective.com/nickabroberts/scans>

attachments.title: scans - nick roberts artist
attachments.text: 20's Mistakes (2016) My Friend Died And All I Can Feel Is This Stupid Color (2015) Sweatshirt Solace (2015) Blaspheme (2015) "This is what my Lord God showed me: There was a basket of figs. He said, 'What do you see, Amos?'...
